Generation IX.Scarlet: When this Pokémon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.
Generation IX.Violet: What appear to be eyeballs are actually organs for discharging the electricity generated by Bellibolt's belly-button dynamo.
